title: Aram Masters Club
body:
In an attempt to see what can be gained from clubs, I thought id start one associated with one of my favorite parts of the game, ARAM!
once i hit level 6 I played ARAM until i hit 30, its good light hearted fun with low stress. 
The Aram Masters Club is a place to find friends to spend time with while crossing the bridge!

add "the doof warrior" or "Destinesia" in game for an invite

replies.body:
,ARAM Club Recruiting actives! Add me in game: Zinna 

:)
I will join tomorrow, I think you can send invitations offline? If so you can do that. IGN is Lurenza ofc.
since the tag ARAM and ARAMS have been taken im going with MOTHA - Master Of The Howling Abyss
